mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.car_id AS "car.id", a.location_begin AS "locationBegin", a.name_begin AS "nameBegin", a.location_end AS "locationEnd", a.name_end AS "nameEnd", a.time_begin AS "timeBegin", a.time_end AS "timeEnd", a.km AS "km", a.driver_type AS "driverType", a.maintenance_id AS "maintenance.id", a.job_desc AS "jobDesc", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.what_day AS "whatDay",
car.name AS "car.name",
maintenance.num AS "maintenance.num",
user.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN tp_car car ON car.id = a.car_id LEFT JOIN tp_maintenance maintenance ON maintenance.id = a.maintenance_id LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_car_track( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, car_id, location_begin, name_begin, location_end, name_end, time_begin, time_end, km, driver_type, maintenance_id, job_desc, user_id, what_day, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{car.id}, #{locationBegin}, #{nameBegin}, #{locationEnd}, #{nameEnd}, #{timeBegin}, #{timeEnd}, #{km}, #{driverType}, #{maintenance.id}, #{jobDesc}, #{user.id}, #{whatDay}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tp_car_track SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, car_id = #{car.id}, location_begin = #{locationBegin}, name_begin = #{nameBegin}, location_end = #{locationEnd}, name_end = #{nameEnd}, time_begin = #{timeBegin}, time_end = #{timeEnd}, km = #{km}, driver_type = #{driverType}, maintenance_id = #{maintenance.id}, job_desc = #{jobDesc}, user_id = #{user.id}, what_day = #{whatDay}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.car_id AS "car.id", a.location_begin AS "locationBegin", a.name_begin AS "nameBegin", a.location_end AS "locationEnd", a.name_end AS "nameEnd", a.time_begin AS "timeBegin", a.time_end AS "timeEnd", a.km AS "km", a.driver_type AS "driverType", a.maintenance_id AS "maintenance.id", a.job_desc AS "jobDesc", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.what_day AS "whatDay" FROM tp_car_track a left join tp_car tc on a.car_id = tc.id where tc.name = #{carName} and a.time_begin = #{startTime}
